title: SUBMISSION OF CONCURRENT AND SENATE RESOLUTIONS

content.text:
The following concurrent resolutions and Senate resolutions were 
read, and referred (or acted upon), as indicated:
content.speaker: Unknown

content.text:
By Ms. KLOBUCHAR (for herself and Mr. Franken):
       S. Res. 321. A resolution honoring the career of Major 
     General Richard C. Nash and recognizing his service to the 
     United States and the State of Minnesota; to the Committee on 
     Armed Services.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
By Mr. LANKFORD (for himself and Mr. Manchin):
       S. Con. Res. 29. A concurrent resolution recognizing the 
     100th anniversary of the Balfour Declaration; to the 
     Committee on Foreign Relations.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

doc_title: SUBMISSION OF CONCURRENT AND SENATE RESOLUTIONS
